title: Japanese Core 1000: Step 5
description: This is Step 5 of the Japanese Core 1000, a series covering the 1,000 most commonly used words in Japanese. Mastering these 1,000 items and sentences will give you the vocabulary and sentence patterns to function in most everyday situations.

series.name: Japanese Core 1000
series.short_description:
This series of ten courses covers the top 1,000 most commonly used words in Japanese.

Mastering these 1,000 items and sentences will give you the vocabulary and sentence patterns to function in most everyday situations.
